    • Uses of ActionObservable in metro.WindowControls

      Subclasses of ActionObservable in metro.WindowControls 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Button
      A button with text ot an image attached to a window.
      class  Checkbox
      A checkbox is a simple control to (de)activate things.
      class  ColorBar
      A color bar is a stripe of all RGB colors.
      class  InputField
      Provides an input field control to make user inputs (in form of a string) possible.
      class  Label
      Create a label to hold text with optional automatic line breaks.
      class  List
      Creates a list control element that can have some entries in it.
      class  Window
      Creates a simple but fancy window with some extra functions like Control-management (managing buttons, labels, etc.).
